name: The Dentonian empire
startIntroPart2: We must begin our plans, for the dentonian empire
declaringWar: you nation has proven to not be saveable via diplomacy, we must fight this corruption before it spreads
attacked: We shall destroy your corruption, consider it a favor, even if you are destroyed too
introduction: Greetings, we hope that your goals align with ours, war isn't as beneficial as peace
neutralHello: Greetings your nation has hope yet
neutralLetsHearIt: Greetings I will hear you out, sir denton is preparing plans for any contingency
neutralNo: this would not be beneficial to the empire
hateHello: perhaps a reform will save your life, I shall make no gurantees for you though
hateNo: no, the though disgusts me and it would harm the empire from even allowing you to continue
hateYes: perhaps we may let you live yet
afterPeace: perhaps you now see what we do to the corrupt do not mess with us again
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
cities: thank you for getting this far bro I see and appreciate you
